attributes.action: Bring back the Covid press conference to at least once a week
attributes.additional_details: It is helpful to be able to see charts so we can digest the data and realise how we need to act correctly to defeat the virus.
attributes.background: If the press conference is brought back to at least once a week it will give clarity on the rules. People are confused. Two metres or one? How many households? The same households or different? How many people together indoors?

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/329874
